title: Jordan Peterson Approaches the Resurrection from the Bottom Up
description:
Commentary 3a on the 5 Part Resurrection Video
 
Overview of parts 1 and 2. In part 3 he redacts Rule 7 from 12 Rules. 

Lewis anticipated the descent into Tyranny and Nihilism and noted that if we lose tradition and authority many will struggle. Religion in the ancient and medieval world actually was able to deploy meaning and comfort to even the most simple minded while today they are left to amusements of distraction.
